Type 2 Faq-O-Matic :
Why can't I post my answer to this Faq-O-Matic?
You must be a current subscriber to either the Type 2 or Vintagebus mailing lists to add information to this Faq-O-Matic. Note however, that the FOM user list is updated daily, it may take as long as 24 hours before the system will let you post. Patience is a virtue... ;-)
edAThintzDOTorg
